name: OWASPDependencyCheck
description: (DEPRECATED) Checks your dependencies for known vulnerabilities.
helpMarkDown: (DEPRECATED) Uses the OWASP dependency check cli tool to scan for known vulnerabilities. [View the extension on the marketplace](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=InfoSupport.infosupport-owasp-dependecy-checker)
author: Info Support

inputs.name: outputDirectory
inputs.label: Output directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The target directory for any output (ie reports)

inputs.name: scanDirectory
inputs.label: Scan directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory that contains the dependencies that need to be scanned

inputs.name: outputFormat
inputs.label: Output format
inputs.helpMarkDown: Output format. When using the SonarQube integration make sure to select 'All Report Types'

inputs.name: useSonarQubeIntegration
inputs.label: Enable SonarQube Integration
inputs.helpMarkDown: Automatically configure the SonarQube scanner to reuse the scan reports. Make sure to include this task after the SonarQube 'Prepare Analysis Configuration' task, and before the 'Run Code Analysis' task. Also, you will need the [dependency-check-sonar-plugin](https://github.com/dependency-check/dependency-check-sonar-plugin) for your SonarQube instance.

inputs.name: additionalArguments
inputs.label: Additional arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Please see the dependency-check [documentation](https://jeremylong.github.io/DependencyCheck/dependency-check-cli/arguments.html) for additional command line arguments.

inputs.name: cveUrlBase
inputs.label: CVE Url Base
inputs.helpMarkDown: Base URL for each yearâ€™s CVE JSON data feed, the %d will be replaced with the year. CVE Url Modified required if Base URL set.

inputs.name: cveUrlModified
inputs.label: CVE Url Modified
inputs.helpMarkDown: URL for the modified CVE JSON data feed. When mirroring the NVD you must mirror the *.json.gz and the *.meta files. CVE Url Base required if Modified URL set.

inputs.name: owaspVersion
inputs.label: Use Owasp version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Owasp version the task should use.
